title: Chipstars
author: Chipstars
content: We're thrilled to introduce “The Sequel Collection” Tournament, brought to you by the masters of thrill, Quickspin. Ready to dive into a world of suspense, excitement, and top-notch gaming? Mark Your Calendars!Join us from 21st September (00:01 CEST) till 28th September (23:59 CEST).Why Play?No Entry Barriers: There's no minimum bet to join in. Jump in as you are€5000 Prize Pool: This isn't just another game. It's your chance to grab a share from a grand total of €5000!Stand Out & Shine! Strike Gold: 1st Rank - €1000 Silver Lining: 2nd Rank - €500 Bronze Beauty: 3rd Rank - €250 Stay in the Top 16: €100 Place 17-36: €75 And, 37-45th Ranks: €50How to Climb the Leaderboard?Every win boosts your score. The more you play, the higher you climb. And remember, 1 EUR bet = 1 point! Participate in the tournament hereRemember: With every spin, you're not just playing; you're competing to make your mark on the leaderboard.Note:Chipstars reserves the right to tweak or suspend this promotion anytime. Don't miss out while it's hot! As always, our General Bonus Terms and Conditions apply.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Instead of creating separate links for announcements of tournaments available in your casino. Use your ANN thread to post this since ANN thread is meant for that. This will help you to bump your thread instead and create discussion in there. This is not a giveaway either which is not appropriate on games and round.Make your ANN thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5375868.80 active using this post. Follow the forum rules on posting topics that belongs to same casino.
